Title: Unique Mechanical Wind Up Skeleton Pocket Watch w/ chain & stand
Description: Unique Mechanical Wind Up Skeleton Pocket Watch w/ chain & stand Features: Skeleton pocket watchHook's on belt or Pocket17 JewelEasy to ReadMechanical Product Details: Product Dimensions: 4 x 4 x 2.5 inchesShipping Weight: 8 ouncesItem model number: 6467TG-AAW2 Description Skeleton - Mechanical movement - manual wind up. - No batteries needed. - 17 Jewels. - 3 hands. - Brass w/ Gold and Silver tone color vertical brushed case with PDP plating. - White classic watch face with easy to read black Roman numerals. - The chain is 14.5 inches (37 cm) long. - The case is 1.75 inches (3.8 cm) in diameter, 1/2 inch thick. - Comes in a nice gift storage box (see the picture).
